# Valid Test Skill

This is a valid skill fixture used for testing the validation and packaging scripts.

## Purpose

This skill demonstrates the correct format for:
- YAML frontmatter
- Required fields (name, description)
- Optional fields (license, metadata)
- Proper naming conventions (hyphen-case)
- Valid description without angle brackets

## Usage

This fixture is used in automated tests to verify that the validation scripts correctly identify valid skills.
